edge_1: After the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents, Alfred Pennyworth becomes his devoted butler and raises him as a surrogate son.
edge_2: At a young age, Bruce Wayne developed a fear of bats after falling down a well and being swarmed by them. This fear is later triggered at the opera when performers dressed as bats disturb him.

edge_1: After the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents, Alfred Pennyworth becomes his devoted butler and raises him as a surrogate son.
edge_2: Bruce Wayne's parents are murdered by mugger Joe Chill in front of him while they were out at the opera.

edge_1: After the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents, Alfred Pennyworth becomes his devoted butler and raises him as a surrogate son.
edge_2: After completing his training with the League of Shadows, Bruce Wayne rejects their methods and escapes from their temple, causing it to collapse and killing Ra's al Ghul in the process.

edge_1: After witnessing the murder of his parents as a child, Bruce Wayne vows to avenge their deaths by taking the life of Joe Chill.
edge_2: After testifying against Carmine Falcone in court, Joe Chill is released on parole. However, he later becomes a victim of Falcone's hitmen.

edge_1: As childhood friends, Rachel Dawes and Bruce Wayne have a close relationship. However, she becomes critical of his methods when he takes the law into his own hands.
